Tour of the French Riviera from Monaco to Cannes, 21 April 2003

---One of the many deluxe boutiques and prestigious jewelers in the town---
---Entering Cannes with luxary apartments on the right---
---The famous Majestic Hotel where reporters stay during the film festival. There are two Chanel shops on this street.---

---Cannes was very crowded---
---Location of the film festival each year- May 14-25 in 2003. These are the steps decked out in red carpeting during the festival.---
